alert.note: Alert for Eastern Payette National Forest; Northern Boise National Forest; Southern Boise, Western Sawtooth NF, including the Camas Prairie; Western Payette National Forest (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued September 01 at 2:22PM MDT until September 03 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITIES POSSIBLE ACROSS PORTIONS OF SOUTHEAST OREGON AND SOUTHWEST IDAHO FRIDAY AND SATURDAY... .An upper trough will move through the Pacific Northwest late Friday into Saturday. Gusty winds will increase across the Burns BLM on Friday with very low daytime humidities. Winds will decrease overnight before increasing and becoming more widespread on Saturday. Gusty southwest winds will spread across southeast Oregon and far southwest Idaho by mid morning Saturday before expanding across the Idaho forest zones by late morning. The strongest winds are expected at higher elevations and along ridgelines. Humidity will remain very low and critical fire weather conditions may develop on Saturday. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITIES FOR WESTERN PAYETTE NATIONAL FOREST...EASTERN PAYETTE NATIONAL FOREST...NORTHERN BOISE NATIONAL FOREST AND SOUTHERN BOISE NATIONAL FOREST/WESTERN SAWTOOTH NATIONAL FOREST...WHICH ARE FIRE WEATHER ZONES 401...402...403 AND 421... The National Weather Service in Boise has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Saturday morning through Saturday evening. * WINDS...10-20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph, except gusts up to 40 mph on ridgelines. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...10-15 percent.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are possible. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Payette National Forest; Northern Boise National Forest; Southern Boise, Western Sawtooth NF, including the Camas Prairie; Western Payette National Forest
